meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #669.

div.div: Doug Molitor game 5. Eric Berman game 1.

td.p: Eric Berman, a journalist from Crown Point, Indiana
Carol Center, a teacher from El Cajon, California
Doug Molitor, a writer from Brentwood, California (whose 4-day cash winnings total $51,001)

tr.td: HORSES
INCREDIBLE EDIBLES
MUSICAL INTROS
(Alex: These could be verses or instrumental lead-ins to pop songs.)
MEN & WOMEN
HOWDY DOODY
"IN" & "OUT"

tr.td: Doug
Carol
Eric
20TH CENTURY PERSONALITIES
[The "TH" was upper case and smaller than the 20.]
MOVIE QUOTES
ON OLD MAPS
FICTIONAL SISTERS
WEATHER
"UP" & "DOWN"

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '[Alex clarified that Raphah (father) or Lahmi (brother) of [*] would have also had to have been accepted.]
DougWho was Goliath?
$1,400
CarolWho was Goliath?
$900
EricWho was Goliath

Goliath (Raphah or Lahmi)')
